00221     enum ColorShadingAlgorithm
00222     {
00223       UndefinedShader,
00224       PseudoColorShader,
00225       FreakOutShader,
00226       ColorRampShader,
00227       UserDefinedShader
00228     };
00229 
00231     enum DrawingStyle
00232     {
00233       UndefinedDrawingStyle,
00234       SingleBandGray,                 // a single band image drawn as a range of gray colors
00235       SingleBandPseudoColor,          // a single band image drawn using a pseudocolor algorithm
00236       PalettedColor,                  //a "Palette" image drawn using color table
00237       PalettedSingleBandGray,        // a "Palette" layer drawn in gray scale
00238       PalettedSingleBandPseudoColor, // a "Palette" layerdrawn using a pseudocolor algorithm
00239       PalettedMultiBandColor,         // currently not supported
00240       MultiBandSingleGandGray,        // a layer containing 2 or more bands, but a single band drawn as a range of gray colors
00241       //added in 1.6 to fix naming glitch
00242       MultiBandSingleBandGray = MultiBandSingleGandGray, // a layer containing 2 or more bands, but a single band drawn as a range of gray colors
00243       MultiBandSingleBandPseudoColor, //a layer containing 2 or more bands, but a single band drawn using a pseudocolor algorithm
00244       MultiBandColor                  //a layer containing 2 or more bands, mapped to RGB color space.
00245       //In the case of a multiband with only two bands, one band will be mapped to more than one color.
00246     };
00247 
00249     enum LayerType
00250     {
00251       GrayOrUndefined,
00252       Palette,
00253       Multiband
00254     } ;
